text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.

section.section:
"Disability" means:
a record of having a physical or mental impairment as otherwise defined under this subsection; or
being regarded as having a physical or mental impairment as otherwise defined under this subsection.

"Disability" includes:
retardation and any other mental impairment or deficiency that may have necessitated remedial or special education and related services.
"Employee" means an individual employed by an employer.

"Employer" means:
a person that:
an agent of a person described in item (i) of this paragraph.
"Employer" includes the State to the extent provided in this title.
Except for a labor organization, "employer" does not include a bona fide private membership club that is exempt from taxation under § 501(c) of the Internal Revenue Code.

"Employment agency" means:
a person that regularly undertakes with or without compensation to procure:
an agent of a person described in item (i) of this paragraph.

Except for the United States Employment Service and the system of State and local employment services receiving federal assistance, "employment agency" does not include a unit of the United States, the State, or a political subdivision of the State.

text.section: "Genetic information" has the meaning stated in § 27-909(a)(3) of the Insurance Article.
"Genetic test" has the meaning stated in § 27-909(a)(5) of the Insurance Article.

section.section:
"Labor organization" means:
a labor organization engaged in an industry; and
an agent of an organization described in item (i) of this paragraph.

"Labor organization" includes:
an organization of any kind, an agency, or an employee representation committee, group, association, or plan:
a conference, general committee, joint or system board, or joint council that is subordinate to a national or international labor organization.

text.section: "Religion" includes all aspects of religious observances, practice, and belief.
